banner.title: Vision Beyond Pixels
banner.description:
Our service goes beyond video analysis to create real value. 
With AI-powered technology, we deliver instant solutions for 
theft prevention, industrial safety, and marketing optimization. 
Unlike conventional services that take about two weeks to 
analyze, our patented technology compresses video by up to 
97%, enabling real-time response.

problem.title:
The Challenge 
We Address
problem.description:
As offline stores regain attention and experiential spaces
 expand, theft has become a growing concern. Traditional RFID
 tags and video surveillance solutions often face high costs
 and frequent malfunctions, limiting their effectiveness. To
 address this, we developed a patented real-time AI video
 analysis technology. By applying neural networkâ€“based video
 compression, we process high-resolution data efficiently and
 deliver real-time insights into customer flow, interests, and
 behavior patterns.
